S03n241:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścidibhyakule ślāghanīyavṛttacāritrasaṃpanne prārthanīyasaṃbandhe kulodbhavānāṃ nipānabhūte śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ kośakoṣṭhāgāranirviśeṣe mitrasvajanānāmabhigamanīye kṛpaṇavanīpakānāmupajīvye śilpijanasyāspadabhūte lakṣmyā dattānugrahasatkāre rājño lokābhisaṃmate janma pratilebhe |
S03n241:4: sa kālānāmatyayenābhivṛddhaḥ kṛtaśramo lokābhimateṣu vidyāsthāneṣvaparokṣabuddhirvividhavikalpāśrayāsu kalāsu jananayanakāntena ca vapuṣā dharmāvirodhinyā ca lokajñatayā svajana iva lokasya hṛdayeṣu paryavartata |
S03n241:5: na hi svajana ityeva svajano bahu manyate |
S03n241:6: jano vā jana ityeva svajanād dṛśyate'nyathā ||1 ||
S03n241:11: sukhodayatvaṃ ca tapovanānāṃ na gehasaukhyeṣu manaḥ sasañje ||3 ||
S03n241:12: sa mātāpitroḥ kālakriyayā saṃvignahṛdayastamanekaśatasahasrasaṃkhyaṃ gṛhavibhavasāraṃ mitrasvajanakṛpaṇaśramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo yathārhamatisṛjya pravavrāja |
S03n241:14: sa dhyānaguṇābhyāsāt sātmībhūtenākṛtakenendriyaprasādena śrutihṛdayāhlādinā ca vidvattāsūcakenānutsiktena vigatalābhāśākārpaṇyadainyena vinayaujasvinā yathārhamadhuropacārasauṣṭhavena dharmādharmavibhāganipuṇena ca vacasā pravrajitācāraśībharayā (ca)
S03n241:16: kautūhalinā ca janena samupalabdhakulapravrajyākramaḥ suṣṭhutaraṃ lokasaṃmatastatrābhūt |
S03n241:19: athāsya tatrābhigamanamupalabhya pitṛvayasyaḥ samabhigamya cainaṃ guṇabahumānāt kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ cāsmai nivedyātmānaṃ pitṛvayasyatāṃ ca saṃkathāprastāvāgatamenaṃ snehāduvāca-cāpalamiva khalvidamanuvartitaṃ bhadantenānapekṣya kulavaṃśamasmin vayasi pravrajatā |
S03n241:20: ārādhyate satpratipattimadbhirdharmo yadāyaṃ bhavane vane vā |
S03n241:21: śrīmanti hitvā bhavanānyatastvaṃ kasmādaraṇyeṣu matiṃ karoṣi ||5 ||
S03n241:24: mūrtaṃ daridratvamivopaguhya kathaṃ nu śokasya vaśaṃ prayāsi |
S03n241:25: imāmavasthāṃ hi tavekṣamāṇā dviṣo'pi bāṣpāpihitekṣaṇāḥ syuḥ ||7 ||
S03n241:26: tadehi pitryaṃ bhavanaṃ tavedaṃ śrutārthasāraṃ bhavatāpi nūnam |
S03n241:27: saṃpādayethā nivasaṃstvamatra dharmaṃ ca satputramanorathaṃ ca ||8 ||
S03n241:31: atha bodhisattvaḥ pravivekasukhāmṛtarasaparibhāvitamatistatpravaṇahṛdayaḥ samupalabdhaviśeṣo gṛhavanavāsayoḥ kāmopabhoganimantraṇāyāṃ tṛpta iva bhojanakathāyāmasukhāyamāna uvāca-
S03n241:36: yatra nāma sukhaṃ naiva sadhanasyādhanasya vā |
S03n241:38: yadapi ceṣṭaṃ gṛhasthenāpi śakyamayamārādhayituṃ dharma iti kāmamevametat |
S03n241:44: yadi dharmamupaiti nāsti gehamatha gehābhimukhaḥ kuto'sya dharmaḥ |
S03n241:46: iti dharmavirodhadūṣitatvād gṛhavāsaṃ ka ivātmavān bhajeta |
S03n241:47: paribhūya sukhāśayā hi dharmaṃ niyamo nāsti sukhodayaprasiddhau ||15 ||
S03n241:48: niyataṃ ca yaśaḥparābhavaḥ syādanutāpo manasaśca durgatiśca |
S03n241:50: api ca, sukho gṛhavāsa iti śraddhāgamyamidaṃ me pratibhāti |
S03n241:53: sukhamatra kutaḥ kathaṃ kadā vā parikalpapraṇayaṃ na cedupaiti |
S03n241:56: prāyaḥ samṛddhyā madameti gehe mānaṃ kulenāpi balena darpam |
S03n241:57: duḥkhena roṣaṃ vyasanena dainyaṃ tasminkadā syātpraśamāvakāśaḥ ||19 ||
S03n241:64: adharmamiśraṃ tu sukhaṃ na kāmaye viṣeṇa saṃpṛktamivānnamātmavān ||22 ||
S03n241:65: ityavagamitamatiḥ sa tena pitṛvayasyo hṛdayagrāhakeṇa vacasā bahumānameva tasminmahāsattve satkāraprayogaviśeṣeṇa pravedayāmāsa |
